mapper.select: select * from hole where uid=#{key} and delete_time is null order by create_time desc

select h.id,h.title,h.content,h.uid,h.type,h.create_time,h.comment_visible,h.can_comment,( case when h.type=2 then "匿名用户" else u.user_name end )userName,u.gender,u.avatar_url from hole h join user u ON u.id=h.uid where h.id=#{id} and h.delete_time is null
